user.name: Sankalp Bahad
user.bio: Undergraduate NLP researcher at LTRC, IIIT Hyderabad. Proficient in C++ and Python. Passionate about advancing language technology through NLP and ML.

node.name: MultiLingual-Video-Subtitle-Semantic-Segmenter
node.description: A Python-based tool, hosted on Gradio app, that automatically downloads YouTube videos, extracts audio, performs multilingual transcription, and generates semantically coherent text chunks.

node.name: P2P-Video-Calling-App
node.description: A Peer to Peer Video calling application with room audio call and chat functionality build using webrtc and socket.

node.name: Flight-Management-System
node.description: A Flight management system implemented with MySQL and Python, demonstrating various insertion, deletion, update and retrieval queries from command line.

node.name: GReddit-Web-App
node.description: A Reddit Clone created with MERN Stack, with various features including sub-reddits, friend requests, blocking users and upvoting, downvoting posts.

node.name: Network-File-System
node.description: A robust Network File System implemented from scratch using C programming language and TCP sockets.

node.name: Linux-Shell
node.description: A simple replica of the Linux Shell (Terminal) implemented from scratch in C with various functionalities like I/O redirection, piping, background and foreground processes, signals, store command history, and other features..
